introText: This is a tier list of the best troops in the mobile game Top Troops. The list is divided into S Tier, A Tier, B Tier, and C Tier. S Tier troops are the best in the game, while C Tier troops are the worst. The tier list is based on my own opinion and experience, but I have tried to be as objective as possible. I hope this tier list helps you choose the best troops for your team!

data.itemDescription: The Oni is a powerful melee unit that can deal massive damage. It also has a lot of health and can take a beating
The Yeti is another powerful melee unit that is known for its crowd control abilities. It can stun multiple enemies at once, making it a great way to break up enemy formations
The Griffin is a ranged unit that can deal a lot of damage from a safe distance. It also has a good amount of health and can survive in the heat of battle
The Angel is a healer that can keep your troops alive in battle. It is also a ranged unit, so it can heal from a safe distance
The Skeleton is a fast and agile melee unit that can deal a lot of damage. It is also good at dodging enemy attacks
The Gargoyle is a flying unit that can deal damage to both ground and air units. It is also good at taking down enemy towers
The Archer is a ranged unit that can deal damage to enemies from a safe distance. However, it is not as powerful as some of the other ranged units in the game
The Wizard is a ranged unit that can deal area of effect damage. However, it is not as powerful as some of the other area of effect damage units in the game
The Giant is a melee unit that has a lot of health. However, it is very slow and can easily be targeted by enemy units
The Goblin is a weak melee unit that does not deal very much damage. It is also very slow and can easily be killed by enemy units
The Bat is a flying unit that does not deal very much damage. It is also very fragile and can easily be killed by enemy units
The Wall is a defensive unit that does not deal any damage. It can be useful for blocking enemy units, but it is not very effective
